item.title: Honourable Mention in Top Ten International Web Products of 2009 on RWW
item.description:
Wow.

Jolie Oâ€™Dell just did the Top Ten International Web Products of 2009 on the always brilliant ReadWriteWeb.

What we did make was the Honourable Mentions list!
